Texts: Goatman Peterson|||This is it! I! Goatman Peterson will become the best detective Supah Star!
Goatman Peterson|||I need to find the Right KILLER and WEAPON OF MURDER.
Goatman Peterson|||I will write every bit of evidence on my SUPAH STAR NOTEBOOK! Let's do this babe!
Jung|||Hmmm... What do you want?
Assattari|||So, you are the detective...Have you already checked the body?
Goatman Peterson|||If you mean yours... OH YEAH BABY! YOU'RE SMOKING HOT!
Assattari|||......................GET OUT OF HERE!!!
Lee|||He's dead! My best friend is dead! Leave me alone!
Goatman Peterson|||OHHH NO! Park! Ohhh Baby! You are DEAD!
Goatman Peterson|||Let's study your bodyyy baby!
Goatman Peterson|||Your body is so bruised! You look like a Panda!
Goatman Peterson|||Your seem to be stung by something on your chest.
Goatman Peterson|||And what is this? You are drenched. I guess it was a steamy fall.
Goatman Peterson|||I have examined the body Boy! Now... Thou shall tell me what happened here!
Jung|||Ugh...Fine... I was changing clothes in the dressroom when I heard a noice in the Hall...
Jung|||When I came out, I found Assattari, our manager, moving the body...
Jung|||She told me to take care of the body while she was going to call the Supah Unit.
Assattari|||What have you found detective? What happened to Park?!
Goatman Peterson|||Oh, my dear lady... I'm working on it!
Goatman Peterson|||I shall find whoever killed him and bring him to sweeeeet JUSTICE! Oh Yeah!
Goatman Peterson|||Now, I need you to tell me what happened here...
Assattari|||I was working on my office, Park came here to say goodbye and we he left the office
Assattari|||I heard a noise coming from the Hall. I went out and found him dead below the stairs.
Assattari|||I tried to move him to see if he was still alive but he wasn't... Damn!
Goatman Peterson|||I will find the killer, It's a SUPAAAH PROMISE!
Goatman Peterson|||Oh... Lee... Your best friend is dead... I cannot believe neither!
Lee|||I...I just can't believe it...
Goatman Peterson|||Don't worry bro, I'll find the killer! Now, tell me what happened...
Lee|||I was working on the studio with Park and Jung.
Lee|||When we finished, I went to the hair saloon to wait for Park. We where going to get a haircut
Goatman Peterson|||I see... Thank you you beautiful bro!
Goatman Peterson|||Oh my, my, my sweet baby Goat Savior... What do we have here?
Ruru|||Oh...oh.... hi?
Goatman Peterson|||And who might you be little one?
Ruru|||My...my name is Ruru
Goatman Peterson|||I see. So, Ruru, what are you doing here? Hidden away from everyone?
Ruru|||I was waiting to see my beautiful Park!
Goatman Peterson|||And how did you get in here?
Ruru|||I sneaked in looking for my Park when I was about to meet him,
Ruru|||I got nervous and hid here
Goatman Peterson|||I see
Goatman Peterson|||Ok, let's see what is in your body again...
Goatman Peterson|||Your body is so bruised! You look like a Panda!
Goatman Peterson|||Your seem to be stung by something on your chest.
Goatman Peterson|||And what is this? You are drenched. I guess it was a steamy fall.
Jung|||So...What have you found?
Assattari|||Tell me... Do you already know who murder Park?
Lee|||Please, tell me you found the killer!
Ruru|||Yes?
Jung|||He’s been acting weird and he seems distressed… No wonder his best mate just died.
Jung|||Though his constant interrogation and lack of trust is starting to get annoying.
Jung|||I don’t trust her. She was moving Park’s body when I found them.
Jung|||I don’t know exactly what happened but I’m pretty sure she has something to do with his death.
Jung|||Don’t buy into that cold pretty face…
Jung|||Crazy fan girl, very annoying and obsessive.
Jung|||I wonder what her life is like if she has nothing better to do than being a stalker.
Jung|||As annoying as he was, that dumb diva did not deserve to die.
Jung|||It would be a lie to say I’m not glad he’s out of my life.
Lee|||We have had our problems as any group in the industry.
Lee|||But lately, Jung has been very aggressive with both of us, particularly with Park…
Lee|||I don’t get what is his problem.
Lee|||Park and her seemed pretty close...
Lee|||There was some kind of special treatment between those two although I couldn’t confirm it…
Lee|||He would talk about her with me.
Lee|||Sigh... I tend to be as nice as I can with fans
Lee|||but that Ruru girl has gotten on my nerves the last few months.
Lee|||The way she was stalking Park was getting out of hand... Borderline psychotic.
Lee|||This… this wasn’t an accident! Someone here killed him, I know it!
Lee|||He helped me in my darkest moment. He wasn’t perfect but he had a big heart!
Lee|||…he …he didn’t deserve death. I will find the culprit with or without you.
Assattari|||He may seem stoic at first sight but he’s short fused and emotional when he’s off guard.
Assattari|||I’m worried about him or if he will be able to continue in the band...
Assattari|||He seems to be in shock and doesn’t trust anyone.
Assattari|||That girl has been very annoying lately, sending weird letters to Park,
Assattari|||stalking him and leaving weird stuff outside the studio and even his home.
Assattari|||He used to tell me he was pretty creeped out on this matter.
Assattari|||He seemed tired when he came to say bye, and as he was about to leave, he fell down the stairs.
Assattari|||When I got to him, he was already dead,
Assattari|||I tried moving him but he wouldn’t budge… That’s when Jung came by…
Ruru|||He's really cool, sometimes kinda scary... in a good way
Ruru|||He's Park best friend...
Ruru|||He's kinda cute as long as he keeps his hands off my Park
Ruru|||That witch! She seduced my Park!
Ruru|||When Ruru sneaked in, Ruru went to look for him and found them arguin like a couple...
Ruru|||She even threw something at him...like a shiny bottle.
Ruru|||Ruru couldn't understand what they were talking about
Ruru|||Ruru got nervous and ran away as he was about to leave the office.
Ruru|||What… No... It can’t be. My Park can’t be dead… Ruru came here to give him a surprise!
Ruru|||Ruru just saw him at that vixen’s office. Now you tell me he´s dead?
Ruru|||It was that witch! She killed him! She killed my Park!...
Jung|||Okay I don't get it, what is happening with this guy?
Jung|||He used to be pretty chill with me...
Jung|||Now is always looking at me with suspicion, questioning my every move.
Jung|||So now she claims she's pregnant with Park's child huh?
Jung|||What a surprise...
Jung|||So much for a 'Responsible Manager'...
Jung|||That girl is here? What the hell?
Jung|||Why haven't you arrested her?
Jung|||She's an obsessive fan that has sent some pretty sick stuff to Park!
Jung|||We didn't get along well, not that it mattered much.
Jung|||At least that diva kept things professional or so I though...
Jung|||Seems he couldn't do that with the Manager haha.
Lee|||He's been acting weird...
Lee|||I saw him looking around as if trying to look for something without anyone noticing.
Lee|||Huh...
Lee|||So that's what they were up to, I sensed it but I couldn't believe it was happening.
Lee|||I always thought we were a family but never in that sense...
Lee|||The stalker is here? Why isn't she detained? Don't get me wrong,
Lee|||I love my fans but... she's a completely different deal.
Lee|||She trespassed the place, she should be the main suspect!
Lee|||Didn't think he would keep something that important from me...
Lee|||I guess everyone has their own secrets even from their best friends,
Lee|||I always though I was the person who was closest to him...
Lee|||Now... i'm not really sure.
Assattari|||He has gotten pretty agressive with me, I think he suspects me a lot.
Assattari|||He won't listen, even if I told him I loved Park...
Assattari|||Poor Lee, he's getting pretty neurotic about it.
Assattari|||I fear he may break under the idea that this was a murder.
Assattari|||He needs a way out and is desperately looking for it... or so it seems to me.
Assattari|||So it was that girl who told you about the fight right?
Assattari|||I didn't think she would dare to enter the studio,
Assattari|||taking her previous letters into account I could really believe she murdered Park.
Assattari|||It was just a few hours ago but... I wish I could change what I said and did...
Assattari|||If I knew it was going to be the last time I saw him...
Assattari|||I wouldn't have shouted him...
Ruru|||Ruru saw him enter here like a crazy beast, luckily Ruru hid.
Ruru|||He seemed to be looking for something...
Ruru|||It was really scary. Was he the one who took my Park?
Ruru|||Ruru has always liked the way Lee treats everyone
Ruru|||but she can´t help but feel a little uneasy when he's near Park.
Ruru|||It feels as if he's always hiding something behind that smile...
Ruru|||What? That witch actually messed around with my Park?
Ruru|||Ruru is gonna kill her!
Ruru|||How dare she mess with the destiny of a couple like ours!?
Ruru|||Oh Park, why did you leave me?
Ruru|||Was it that vixen that stole your life so we couldn't be together?
Jung|||The guy is starting to lose it, he's becoming paranoic and accusing everyone.
Jung|||Look, one thing is to be suspicious and other is to threaten someone else without any basis.
Jung|||What kind of manager... Wait no.
Jung|||What kind of person throws a blunt object at someone?
Jung|||Doesn't she know she call kill someone with that?
Jung|||Perhaps the hit didn't kill Park inmediately.
Jung|||She's playing dumb but she knows perfectly well what she is doing,
Jung|||If I know one thing about stalkers is that they pay excessive attention to what they are obsesed with.
Jung|||She's no fool, don't trust her playing the victim...
Jung|||So he fell down now? He was the best dancer between the three of us,
Jung|||I can't picture him losing his balance, maybe it was because of the hit on the head by the manager...
Lee|||He's hiding something, he has gotten impatient with everyone as time has passed...
Lee||| I'm not convinced he's innocent, it feels as if he's in a hurry for all of this to end...
Lee|||So she did hit him...
Lee|||How can you be so sure that it wasn't the strike to the head that weakened and made him fall afterwards?
Lee|||Either way she's dangerous for just that reason alone...
Lee|||We still don't know her intentions
Lee|||Or at least what she was planning to do here if she found Park alone...
Lee|||Even if he had his secrets,
Lee|||He still was my best friend and the one I held closest to my heart.
Lee|||I will find the one who did this to him...
Assattari|||He needs to stop!
Assattari|||He just came here demanding to check my office and accusing me of taking 'It'.
Assattari|||I don't even know what he meant by 'It'...
Assattari|||Lee keeps asking me why I was moving the body and why didn't I call for help until Jung arrived on his own...
Assattari|||I was just shocked... I had to act on my own, I thought I could save his life.
Assattari|||So she was the one responsible for the puddle...
Assattari|||As I feared she ended up causing trouble just by existing without any self control, and costing us Park...
Assattari|||Hope she's happy now...
Assattari|||He seemed tired when he came to say bye, and as he was about to leave, he fell down the stairs.
Assattari|||When I got to him, he was already dead, I tried moving him but he wouldn’t budge…
Assattari|||That’s when Jung came by...
Ruru|||He's been glaring Ruru a lot lately, Ruru already said she's sorry.
Ruru|||Ruru didn't mean to cause trouble...
Ruru|||He just came here asking Ruru if she had touched Park's body, and what were my intentions here...
Ruru|||Ruru couldn't answer he was very scary and unrecognizable...
Ruru|||What? That witch actually messed around with my Park?
Ruru|||If she hadn't hit my Park with that stupid chicken maybe he wouldn't have fallen down the stairs because of Ruru's sweat...
Ruru|||Yes it's all that witches fault!
Ruru|||Were you waiting to tell Ruru something?
Ruru|||Why were you holding onto Ruru's letter?
Ruru|||What was going in your mind?
Ruru|||Ruru wishes she could hug you...
Jung|||I was convinced he didn't have to do with the crime, but now I'm not so sure...
Jung|||Why was he hiding the Pin?
Jung|||If she didn't take the Pin then why was she moving the body?
Jung|||I was convinced she wanted that thing since it costs a lot!
Jung|||Don't believe anything she says!
Jung|||Even if she came here only for Parks phone why didn't she run away from the studio before all of this happened?
Jung|||The body is starting to smell weird, like gin, is it normal? It has only been a few hours...
Lee|||You see, Jung wanted the Pin, that's why I didn't want to show the thing to you until now.
Lee|||I feared that he was looking for it to steal it, it costed me a fortune afterall...
Lee|||Looks like she had no idea about the Pin, my worry was misplaced on her.
Lee|||Still that won't change the fact that she dared hurt Park...
Lee|||Even if she didn't kill him on purpose, shouldn't she be hold accountable along with Assatari for crime?
Lee|||We just wanted to celebrate today and have our hairs done...
Lee|||Why did it turn out to be like this?
Assattari|||He seems oddly calm, as if he no longer has a need to be so neurotic or agressive.
Assattari|||Did it have something to do with the Pin?
Assattari|||What is he thinking hiding critical information from you?
Assattari|||It doesn't make sense, even if he wanted to save the Pin for its value...
Assattari|||If he truly cared about Park, wouldn't he help you completely from the start?
Assattari|||Get that psycho away from me! I just saw her lurking outside the office
Assattari|||I don't know what her intentions are,
Assattari|||But I don't want to deal with her considering the mess she carries around her being...
Assattari|||The body seem's to be turning purple, is that normal?
Assattari|||Even for an internal bleeding it shouldn´t be like that...
Ruru|||Ruru saw Jung enter the room before you arrived, he seemed in a hurry moving all the furniture around
Ruru|||Ruru was scared he would discover Ruru was here...
Ruru|||He's so different Ruru can't even recognize him, at first Ruru thought he was cute but now Ruru can only feel fear towards him.
Ruru|||It's all her fault! Ruru doesn't care if she's innocent!
Ruru|||She took Park away from Ruru even before he died...
Ruru|||Then...
Ruru|||Ruru will make sure to take her baby before I'm gone.
Ruru|||What is happening to my Park, his body looks weird as if he was going to become a grape...
Jung|||The hell... What is this slimy thing on the stairs, it doesn't seem to be water...
Lee|||When I got here, he was already covered in that slimy stuff.
Lee|||It has a familiar smell but I can't tell what it is exactly...
Assattari|||I saw him slip and fall down the stairs because of that liquid.
Assattari|||I don't know if someone was there while I was talking with Park but
Assattari|||that puddle wasn´t there before he came into my office.
Ruru|||Eww...
Ruru|||Ruru doesn't know much about that stuff, it looks gross don't get it close to me! ...
Jung|||That's something Park gifted Assatari as a thanks for her support, he always picked weird stuff as a gift...
Jung|||Huh? It's a bit dented, that's a bit weird...
Jung|||I wonder if Assatari let it fell down, she's pretty careful with everything in her office.
Lee|||That chicken huh...
Lee|||It was a gift we gave Assatari as thanks for the wonderful work she had done for the band.
Lee|||It is made of a very strong glass, or at least that's what the shopkeeper said...
Assattari|||This...
Assattari|||It was a gift from the boys, it fell the other day from my desk.
Assattari|||I wasn't paying attention and dropped it. Everyone can be clumsy from time to time i guess...
Ruru|||Haha that's a funny chicken!
Ruru|||Ruru remembers she saw the band checking that thing out some months ago...
Ruru|||not that she was following them... Ruru just happened to walk by...
Ruru|||What a coincidence, don't you think?
Ruru|||Haha... Ruru was pretty lucky that day...
Goatman Peterson|||This is the Studios Key, now i can enter that place. I wonder why it was locked...
Goatman Peterson|||There is an exquicite collection of rare Pins in here...
Goatman Peterson|||Huh! Jung doesn't seem like a guy who would collect this kind of things
Goatman Peterson|||As always there is more to someone than meets the eye.
Goatman Peterson|||Some hair cut and style magazines, it seems he's pretty interested in fashion.
Goatman Peterson|||There is also a jewerly magazine although this one seems to be quite trashed, maybe he carried that one around a lot.
Goatman Peterson|||Aside from that letter there are some photos of him and Lee, even one with Assatari....
Goatman Peterson|||None with Jung... that's curious.
Goatman Peterson|||There's also a magazine of... Bald Italian Men?
Goatman Peterson|||What a weird taste for a KStar, but who am I to judge I like to lick things, you could say I got an elaborate taste...
Goatman Peterson|||... I should stop making mental puns, it might be bad for my health
Jung|||The hell is this?
Jung|||Another of his crazy fan letters, he should just throw that away, who knows what sickening stuff is written there.
Jung|||Why was Park holding onto this?
Lee|||That's Ruru's handwritting...
Lee|||What was Park thinking holding onto this?
Lee|||Perhaps... knowing him he was preparing some evidence for a restraint order
Lee|||I can't think of another reason of why he would keep a letter from her
Lee|||He threw the other gifts she sent as soon as he got them.
Assattari|||... That girl again...
Assattari|||Kids these days messing around with nothing else to do and causing trouble with their naive and troublesome mindset..
Ruru|||He was keeping my letter???
Ruru|||OMG! He truly loved me, he was about to confess himself to me, Ruru is sure of that! But...
Ruru|||What does it matter now?... he's DEAD...
Ruru|||You need to find the culprit
Ruru|||Ruru will make that trash pay for taking my Park from me!
Jung|||Tsk... Those two were always messing around with my hobby...
Jung|||So what if I like collecting Pins!
Jung|||It pisses me off when people messes around with stuff that's none of their business.
Lee|||That's Ruru's handwritting...
Lee|||What was Park thinking holding onto this?
Lee|||Perhaps... knowing him he was preparing some evidence for a restraint order
Lee|||I can't think of another reason of why he would keep a letter from her
Lee|||He threw the other gifts she sent as soon as he got them.
Assattari|||... That girl again...
Assattari|||Kids these days messing around with nothing else to do and causing trouble with their naive and troublesome mindset..
Ruru|||He was keeping my letter???
Ruru|||OMG! He truly loved me, he was about to confess himself to me, Ruru is sure of that! But...
Ruru|||What does it matter now?... he's DEAD...
Ruru|||You need to find the culprit
Ruru|||Ruru will make that trash pay for taking my Park from me!
